alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 27 at 2:09PM PDT until October 29 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing temperatures of 28 to 32 for a couple of hours. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Sunday and Monday mornings. Coldest on Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley
